info.name: reap
info.description: APIs for respondent features and responses.

request.description: `source.response` can be int or string (for doing a like search on OPEN_ENDED)
`source.response` can be int or string (for doing a like search on OPEN_ENDED)

Attributes:

* firstName `Samuel` (string)
* lastName `Chinenyeze` (string)
* mobile `12345678902` (string, required)
* email `cadbury[at]mailinator.com` (string)
* ageGroup `16-34` (string)
* employment `Employed` (string)
* gender `Male` (string)
* country `Nigeria` (string, required)
* region `Port Harcourt` (string)

query.description: There should be no spaces between the commas, e.g. 3,1

request.description:
This endpoint is the first response used to setup the user config

* If respondentId is passed then only require mobile in metadata

response.name: Post Response

request.description: Creates survey that has been launched in the reap service
For organization user to get the status of a survey.

For organization user to get the status of a survey.
List surveys for respondents in app.
Send airtime to repondents that have completed a survey.
Send airtime to repondents that have completed a survey.
Send airtime to repondents that have completed a survey.
For organization user to get the status of a survey.

The body can be any of the following:
```
{
    "respondentId": "51f7bbb0-0ce4-4b7f-8d80-73e595447142"
}
```
or
```
{
    "country": "South Africa",
    "mobile": "+271000001",
    "ageGroup": "16-17",
    "employment": "Employed",
    "gender": "Male",
    "race": "Black",
    "lsmKeys": [
        "i1",
        "i2",
        "i3"
    ]
}
```
For organization user to get the status of a survey.
